item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Dan. I work in IT and I’m currently a Senior Solutions Engineer for BeyondTrust, a major player in the Privileged Access Management and Remote Access space. I’m something of a jack of all trades - I know some stuff about on-prem and cloud infrastructure, scripting / development, operations, infrastructure management and deployment, and not least of all security. I should do at least - I’ve been doing this for around 20 years.
